segments.text: Welcome . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I would like a room please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . We have quite a selection for you to choose from . There are double rooms with twin beds , suites , if you'd like , we have presidential suite on the top floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right sir . How many nights will you be staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A few nights , I'm not quite sure of my schedule yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll just need to see a credit card and passport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the rate for a double room for one night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since it is low season , we are running a special rate right now of 150 yuan per night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the features in the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our rooms include television set , air-conditioning and a bathroom .
segments.speaker: S2
